meanings.definition: To join metals together by heating and melting a filler metal into the joint
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith brazed the two pieces of metal together in the fire.
meanings.sent2: The welder brazed the pipes to create a strong connection.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully brazed the fork and spoon together as a joke.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was brazed through shared experiences and trust.
meanings.sent5: The artist brazed the broken pieces of glass into a beautiful mosaic.
